svt_uart_monitor_callback Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for class svt_uart_monitor_callback:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Monitor callback class contains the callback methods called by the UART Monitor component.


Public Member Functions

virtual function void  config_pre_output_port_put ( svt_uart_monitor monitor , svt_uart_configuration cfg )
function void  new ( string name = "svt_uart_monitor_callback" )
virtual function void  pre_xact_observed_put ( svt_uart_monitor monitor , svt_uart_transaction xact , ref bit drop )

virtual function void  transaction_started ( svt_uart_monitor monitor , svt_uart_transaction xact )

Member Function Documentation

 virtual function void
 svt_uart_monitor_callback::config_pre_output_port_put
 (  svt_uart_monitor monitor , svt_uart_configuration cfg  ) 

Called before putting a configuration

monitor - A reference to the svt_uart_monitor component that is issuing this callback. The user's callback implementation can use this to access the public data and/or methods of the component.

cfg - A reference to the configuration descriptor object of interest.

 Superseding functions 
 svt_uart_monitor_xml_writer_callback :: config_pre_output_port_put

 virtual function void
 svt_uart_monitor_callback::pre_xact_observed_put
 (  svt_uart_monitor monitor , svt_uart_transaction xact , ref bit drop  ) 

Called before putting a transaction to the analysis port

monitor - A reference to the svt_uart_monitor component that is issuing this callback. The user's callback implementation can use this to access the public data and/or methods of the component.

xact - A reference to the data descriptor object of interest.

drop - A ref argument, which if set by the user's callback implementation causes the component to discard the transaction descriptor without further action

 Superseding functions 
 svt_uart_monitor_xml_writer_callback :: pre_xact_observed_put 

 virtual function void
 svt_uart_monitor_callback::transaction_ended
 (  svt_uart_monitor monitor , svt_uart_transaction xact  ) 

Called when transaction end is observed on port

monitor - A reference to the svt_uart_monitor component that is issuing this callback. The user's callback implementation can use this to access the public data and/or methods of the component.

xact - A reference to the transaction descriptor object of interest.

 Superseding functions

 virtual function void
 svt_uart_monitor_callback::transaction_started
 (  svt_uart_monitor monitor , svt_uart_transaction xact  ) 

Called when transaction start is observed on port

monitor - A reference to the svt_uart_monitor component that is issuing this callback. The user's callback implementation can use this to access the public data and/or methods of the component.

xact - A reference to the transaction descriptor object of interest.

 virtual function void
 svt_uart_monitor_callback::xact_observed_cov
 (  svt_uart_monitor monitor , svt_uart_transaction xact  ) 

Callback issued to allow the testbench to collect functional coverage information from a transaction that is put into the analysis port.

monitor - A reference to the svt_uart_monitor component that is issuing this callback. The user's callback implementation can use this to access the public data and/or methods of the component.

xact - A reference to the transaction descriptor object of interest.

 Superseding functions 
 svt_uart_monitor_def_cov_data_callbacks :: xact_observed_cov
